dict.acceptation: 准备，预备；准备工作[措施]；预修，预习预习时间，（对…的）准备；（药，菜等的）配制，备办，制剂，配制品，配制好的食物；

sent.orig: Scope: Internal Medicine (preparation period of one year preparation period of one year).
sent.trans: 经营范围：内科（筹建期一年）。

sent.orig: The medicament preparation, adding and automatic control coal preparation plant, Dongtan Coal Mine are introduced.
sent.trans: 介绍了东滩煤矿选煤厂药剂制备、添加和自动控制系统。

sent.orig: Based on project preparation stage, the paper discusses to apply PERT for shortening construction preparation period.
sent.trans: 从工程项目的前期筹备阶段入手，探讨将网络计划技术运用到该阶段，以达到缩短项目筹备阶段的目的。

sent.orig: Liquid Ganoderma spore oil capsule and preparation method relates to a Chinese medicinal preparation.
sent.trans: 灵芝孢子油液体胶囊及制备方法，涉及一种中药制剂。

sent.orig: Preparation of specifications, report preparation and other activities requiring knowledge of principles, practices.
sent.trans: 编写产品规格，报告和其它需要了解产品基本原理知识和实际情况的工作。
